Description_: At the start of the battle, *Destroy* self and equip <UNIT>14002|1</UNIT> to *adjacent* empty grids.
At the start of the battle, *Destroy* self and equip <MODUNIT>@|unitB|2</MODUNIT> to empty grids in the *same lane*.
On load, play a different animation.
On load, play the animation once, then reset.
